typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Deliver Point Code} as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Delivery_Point_Desc as string,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Desc]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Long_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp
RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp select(mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp = Deliver_Point_Code,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp = Delivery_Point,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Desc,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Long_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp lookup({Deliver Point Code} == Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull({Deliver Point Code})),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Delivery Point Code cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Deliver Point Code})) || not(isNull({Delivery Point}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp) || notEquals({Delivery Point}, Delivery_Point_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy({Deliver Point Code},
		{Delivery Point},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive({Delivery Point} = iifNull({Delivery Point}, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Deliver_Point_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code = {Deliver Point Code},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code = {Deliver Point Code},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		Indicator_Code as string,
		Indicator_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Indicator_Code as string,
		Indicator_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT \n       [Indicator_Code]\n      ,[Indicator_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Indicator]',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimIndicatorLkp
DatamartDimIndicatorLkp select(mapColumn(
		Indicator_Code_Lkp = Indicator_Code,
		Indicator_Desc_Lkp = Indicator_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimIndicatorLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimIndicatorLkp lookup(Indicator_Code == Indicator_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Indicator_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Indicator_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Indicator_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(Indicator_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Indicator Code cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(Indicator_Code)) || not(isNull(Indicator_Desc))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Indicator_Code_Lkp) || notEquals(Indicator_Desc, Indicator_Desc_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy(Indicator_Code,
		Indicator_Desc,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive({Delivery Point} = iifNull(Indicator_Desc, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Indicator_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Indicator_Code,
		Indicator_Desc,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Indicator_Code,
		Indicator_Desc,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species_Desc as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species_Group as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species_Group]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup(Species_Code == Species_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(Species_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Species Code cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(Species_Code)) || not(isNull(Species_Desc)) || not(isNull(Genus)) || not(isNull(Species_Group))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp) || notEquals(Species_Desc, Species_Lkp) || notEquals(Genus, Genus_Lkp) || notEquals(Species_Group, Species_Group_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy(Species_Code,
		Species_Desc,
		Genus,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive(Species_Desc = iifNull(Species_Desc, "Undefined"),
		Genus = iifNull(Genus, "Undefined"),
		Species_Group = iifNull(Species_Group, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Species_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Code,
		Species = Species_Desc,
		Genus,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Code,
		Species = Species_Desc,
		Genus,
		Species_Group,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Type]\n      ,[Basis]\n      ,[Price_Point]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimTypeLkp
RelationalDimTypeLkp select(mapColumn(
		Type_Lkp = Type,
		Basis_Lkp = Basis,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimTypeLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimTypeLkp lookup(Type == Type_Lkp
	&& Basis == Basis_Lkp
	&& Price_Point == Price_Point_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(Type)) && not(isNull(Basis)) && not(isNull(Price_Point)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Type/Basis/Price_Point cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(Type)) || not(isNull(Basis)) || not(isNull(Price_Point))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
CheckInputRecord@Valid aggregate(groupBy(Type,
		Basis,
		Price_Point,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Type','Basis','Price_Point'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Type,
		Basis,
		Price_Point,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Type,
		Basis,
		Price_Point,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string,
		UOM_Long_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [UOM_Name]\n      ,[UOM_Desc]\n      ,[UOM_Type]\n      ,[UOM_Long_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_UOM]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimUomLkp
RelationalDimUomLkp select(mapColumn(
		UOM_Name_Lkp = UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type_Lkp = UOM_Type,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Long_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimUomLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimUomLkp lookup(UOM_Name == UOM_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(UOM_Name)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("UOM Name cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(UOM_Name)) || not(isNull(UOM_Desc)) || not(isNull(UOM_Type))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp) || notEquals(UOM_Desc, UOM_Desc_Lkp) || notEquals(UOM_Type, UOM_Type_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy(UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive(UOM_Desc = iifNull(UOM_Desc, "Undefined"),
		UOM_Type = iifNull(UOM_Type, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UOM_Name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

source(output(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		name as string,
		date as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(asset_id,
		fund_id,
		name,
		date,
		type),
	count = count(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testUnique.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		asset_id,
		fund_id,
		name,
		date,
		type
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
